name: Sentinels of The Multiverse: The Video Game
name_original: Sentinels of The Multiverse: The Video Game
description:
Sentinels of The Multiverse: The Video Game is a card game developed by Handelabra Games and Greater Than Games. It was originally released in 2014. Handelabra Games published the game.
Sentinels of The Multiverse: The Video Game is available on PC.
